description:
Highly durable and technically precise, the lightweight Ribelle Run GTX is the ideal choice for short to medium distance training and racing in rugged terrain and wet or cold conditions. The upper features a lightweight abrasion resistant mesh backed by GORE-TEX® Invisible Fit, for waterproof-breathable protection without compromising comfort. A climbing inspired rand and a precision fit make this the ultimate trail technician for foul weather forays into the alpine.

Underfoot, the SuperGum outsole is both sticky and durable, providing all the confidence you need to handle whatever mountain mission you dream up.
name: Scarpa Ribelle Run GTX - Mens
